an10.96:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando rajagahe viharati tapodarame.
an10.96:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya yena tapoda tenupasankami gattani parisincitum.
an10.96:1.3: Tapodaya gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasi gattani pubbapayamano.
an10.96:1.4: Kokanudopi kho paribbajako rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya yena tapoda tenupasankami gattani parisincitum.
an10.96:2.1: Addasa kho kokanudo paribbajako ayasmantam anandam duratova agacchantam.
an10.96:4.1: “Puccheyyama mayam ayasmantam kincideva desam, sace ayasma okasam karoti panhassa veyyakaranaya”ti.
an10.96:5.1: “Kim nu kho, bho, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—evamditthi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:6.1: “Kim pana, bho, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—evamditthi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:7.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
an10.96:7.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannanti—evamditthi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:7.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan’”ti.
an10.96:8.1: “Tena hi bhavam na janati, na passati”ti?
an10.96:8.2: “Na kho aham, avuso, na janami na passami.
an10.96:9.1: “‘Kim nu kho, bho, sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannanti—
an10.96:9.4: sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:10.1: ‘Kim pana, bho, asassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannanti—
an10.96:10.4: asassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:11.1: Kim nu kho, bho, antava loko …pe…
an10.96:11.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
an10.96:11.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannanti—
an10.96:11.11: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:12.1: ‘Tena hi bhavam na janati na passati’ti, iti puttho samano:
an10.96:12.2: ‘na kho aham, avuso, na janami na passami.
an10.96:12.4: Yatha katham panavuso, imassa bhasitassa attho datthabbo”ti?
an10.96:13.1: “‘Sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti kho, avuso, ditthigatametam.
an10.96:13.2: ‘Asassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti kho, avuso, ditthigatametam.
an10.96:13.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
an10.96:13.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti kho, avuso, ditthigatametam.
an10.96:14.1: Yavata, avuso, ditthi yavata ditthitthanam ditthiadhitthanam ditthipariyutthanam ditthisamutthanam ditthisamugghato, tamaham janami tamaham passami.
an10.96:14.2: Tamaham jananto tamaham passanto kyaham vakkhami:
an10.96:15.1: “Ko namo ayasma, kathanca panayasmantam sabrahmacari jananti”ti?
an10.96:15.4: “Mahacariyena vata kira, bho, saddhim mantayamana na janimha:
